languages.text: Некогда по мосту ступали процессии, восхваляющие Императора. Но со временем он стал лишь воспоминанием о былом величии района.
Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.
languages.original_text: Некогда по мосту ступали процессии, восхваляющие Императора. Но со временем он стал лишь воспоминанием о былом величии района.

traits.locale_text: Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.
Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.

Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.
Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.

languages.text: 赞美帝皇的庄严队伍曾经从这座桥上大步走过。但如今，这座桥已经成为这片地区昔日辉煌的唯一见证。
languages.original_text: Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.

traits.locale_text: 赞美帝皇的庄严队伍曾经从这座桥上大步走过。但如今，这座桥已经成为这片地区昔日辉煌的唯一见证。

languages.text: Antaño, solemnes procesiones en honor al Emperador recorrían este puente, pero ahora es el único testamento restante de la antigua gloria de este lugar.
languages.original_text: Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.

traits.locale_text: Antaño, solemnes procesiones en honor al Emperador recorrían este puente, pero ahora es el único testamento restante de la antigua gloria de este lugar.

languages.text: かつては皇帝を讃える厳かな行列がこの橋を行き交っていたが、今となってはかつての威容が残るのみだ。
languages.original_text: Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.

traits.locale_text: かつては皇帝を讃える厳かな行列がこの橋を行き交っていたが、今となってはかつての威容が残るのみだ。

languages.text: À une époque, des processions solennelles en hommage à l'Empereur franchissaient ce pont. Aujourd'hui, il ne s'agit plus que du dernier vestige de la grandeur oubliée de la zone.
languages.original_text: Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.

traits.locale_text: À une époque, des processions solennelles en hommage à l'Empereur franchissaient ce pont. Aujourd'hui, il ne s'agit plus que du dernier vestige de la grandeur oubliée de la zone.

languages.text: Über diese Brücke marschierten einst ernste Prozessionen zur Lobpreisung des Imperators, doch heute ist sie das Einzige, was noch an die frühere Großartigkeit dieses Bereichs erinnert.
languages.original_text: Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.

traits.locale_text: Über diese Brücke marschierten einst ernste Prozessionen zur Lobpreisung des Imperators, doch heute ist sie das Einzige, was noch an die frühere Großartigkeit dieses Bereichs erinnert.

languages.text: Bir zamanlar bu köprüden İmparator'a övgüler yağdıran alaylar geçerdi. Şimdilerdeyse bölgenin eski mükemmelliğinin tek şahidi olarak öylece duruyor.
languages.original_text: Once solemn processions praising the Emperor walked across this bridge, but now it stands as the only testament to the area's former greatness.

traits.locale_text: Bir zamanlar bu köprüden İmparator'a övgüler yağdıran alaylar geçerdi. Şimdilerdeyse bölgenin eski mükemmelliğinin tek şahidi olarak öylece duruyor.
